column4: hi guys, doing an install of 04.11, im stuck at bootloader install failed, none of the options will work, even cancel the install, any help most appreciated
checksum your cd
is good
reboot, if problems exist, reinstall grub yourself
is the install complete other than bootloader, ie the bootloader the last section?
should be
you could also try reinstalling and telling it not to install the bootloader (is that still an option on the cd?)
not sure, im on usb drive
huh?
dont worry, im loosing my mind here lol
oh, but you are using the regular desktop install?  That's what I meant
yes, normal desktop
